This would allow the Force intelligence community to have access to RAF iBase through the Authority’s Dii network.
The FIB data will be transferred to the SPCB CITRIX server in 2 phases.

Phase 1 - will require the appointed service provider to examine all the FIB data held on all in-use systems (FIB and Squadron Intelligence Analyst) to ensure that it is of the same format and is compatible with data held at SPCB, collect that data and store it in readiness for phase 2.
